characters.name: Apollo Justice
characters.description1: Another lawyer at the office. He's passionate about the law, and hates anything that's not fair or just.
characters.description2: Assaulted during the trial yesterday. Thankfully, he's going to be okay, but he's still at the hospital undergoing treatment.

characters.name: Juniper Woods
characters.description1: Our client in this case. We've been friends since childhood. A sweet girl who loves nature.
characters.description2: The defendant in this case. She's accused of the courtroom bombing and the assault on Apollo.

characters.name: Candice Arme
characters.description1: The victim in this case. A detective who was heading up the investigation into a bombing incident.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: A young, rookie lawyer at our agency. She's also our client's friend.

characters.name: Gaspen Payne
characters.description1: The prosecuting attorney. He just seems to exude unpleasantness...
characters.description2: The prosecuting attorney. The younger brother of another prosecutor I know. This one lacks presence, too...

characters.name: Ted Tonate
characters.description1: A police bomb specialist. He was in charge of handling the bomb that exploded in the courtroom.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: An aspiring magician who Mr. Wright adopted when duty called.

characters.name: Jinxie Tenma
characters.description1: The maid of Kyubi Manor and a friend of Trucy. She thinks I'm a demon.

characters.name: The Amazing Nine-Tails
characters.description1: A masked wrestler of unknown identity and origin. The nine-tailed cape he sports is the signature piece of his costume.

characters.name: Damian Tenma
characters.description1: Jinxie's father and the mayor of Tenma Town. He was found unconscious at the scene of the crime.

characters.name: Rex Kyubi
characters.description1: The deceased alderman of Nine-Tails Vale. His snow-white hair was particularly striking.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: The latest lawyer to join our agency. She apparently studied psychology while she was in Europe!

characters.name: Phineas Filch
characters.description1: The caretaker of Kyubi Manor. He says he was guarding the entrance at the time of the murder.

characters.name: Bobby Fulbright
characters.description1: The detective investigating the murder in Nine-Tails Vale. He's a self-styled champion of justice and keeper of the peace.

characters.name: Florent L'Belle
characters.description1: Mayor Tenma's aide. He was supposedly in the foyer with Filch at the time of the murder.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: A brilliant former defense attorney who is supposed to be in retirement...

characters.name: Simon Blackquill
characters.description1: A prosecutor and prison inmate. He has mastered the use of psychological manipulation in courtroom battles.

characters.name: Apollo Justice
characters.description1: A lawyer who's been at the agency since before I joined. He has an amazing ability to spot lies through people's tells.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: The lawyer who owns the agency. I owe him for giving me the chance to become a full-fledged lawyer.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: Mr. Wright's darling daughter. She wants to be a famous magician someday.

characters.name: Aristotle Means
characters.description1: A lawyer course professor at the academy. His smile is somewhat scary.
characters.description2: A lawyer course professor at the academy. His smile is somewhat scary, as is his educational policy.

characters.name: Constance Courte
characters.description1: The professor who invited Mr. Wright to the academy. She is a judge course teacher, but she's not very punctual.
characters.description2: The professor who invited Mr. Wright here. She was a judge course teacher until she became the victim of this case.

characters.name: Juniper Woods
characters.description1: A senior in the judge course. She's a good friend, and I've known her since childhood.

characters.name: Hugh O'Conner
characters.description1: A senior in the lawyer course who served as the defense in the mock trial. He seems like kind of a jerk.
characters.description2: A senior in the lawyer course who served as the defense in the mock trial. He took seven years off from school at one point.

characters.name: Robin Newman
characters.description1: A senior in the prosecutor course who served as the prosecution in the mock trial. He tends to shout at people.
characters.description2: A senior in the prosecutor course who served as the prosecution in the mock trial. "He" is really a "she" who'd rather be an artist.

characters.name: Bobby Fulbright
characters.description1: The lively detective in charge of this case. He makes you wonder what justice is really all about.

characters.name: Simon Blackquill
characters.description1: A prosecutor and prison inmate. He has mastered the use of psychological manipulation in courtroom battles.

characters.name: Klavier Gavin
characters.description1: Mr. Rock Star Prosecutor himself, he was the leader and vocalist of the Gavinners.

characters.name: Myriam Scuttlebutt
characters.description1: A senior in the judge course. She is the aloof editor-in-chief of the school paper who walks around with a box over her head.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: The latest lawyer to join our agency. She lived in Europe for a time, where she studied psychology.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: The head of our office. He was retired once, but made his return to the legal world a few months ago.

characters.name: Apollo Justice
characters.description1: The lawyer at my agency who was attacked during the court bombing trial. He's currently recovering at the hospital.
characters.description2: Currently working on his own. He says he wants to bring his friend's killer to justice, but I wonder if that's all.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: An aspiring magician who Mr. Wright adopted when duty called.

characters.name: Clay Terran
characters.description1: The victim in this case. He was a HAT-2 crew member and a close friend of mine.

characters.name: Juniper Woods
characters.description1: Athena's childhood friend. Talented singer and Student Council President, she is studying to be a judge.

characters.name: Solomon Starbuck
characters.description1: The defendant in this case. He was a HAT-2 crew member and a mentor to the victim.

characters.name: Simon Blackquill
characters.description1: A prosecutor and prison inmate. He can manipulate witnesses through the power of suggestion.
characters.description2: Convicted of the murder at the Space Center seven years ago. He's chasing a phantom he saw back then.

characters.name: Bobby Fulbright
characters.description1: The detective assigned to this case. He led the evacuation effort at the Space Center after the bombing incident.

characters.name: Candice Arme
characters.description1: A detective who specialized in bomb cases. Was on detail at the Space Center. One of the first to find the body.

characters.name: Yuri Cosmos
characters.description1: The director of the Space Center and one of the first people to discover the body. He seems exceedingly full of himself.

characters.name: Ponco
characters.description1: A guide robot at the Space Center. She can provide information on the Center and show people around.

characters.name: Aura Blackquill
characters.description1: A researcher who's developing robots at the Space Center. She is Prosecutor Blackquill's older sister.

characters.name: Clonco
characters.description1: One of the robots developed by Aura, who refers to him as "Hunk of Junk".

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: A new lawyer at the agency. She's been arrested as the suspect in the case.
characters.description2: A lawyer who works under me. She is currently the main suspect in her mother's murder, which took place seven years ago.

characters.name: Apollo Justice
characters.description1: Currently working on his own. He says he wants to bring his friend's killer to justice, but I wonder if that's all.
characters.description2: An ardent young lawyer at my agency. His voice can get really loud at times.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: My daughter, who also happens to be an aspiring magician. I adopted her eight years ago.

characters.name: Clay Terran
characters.description1: The victim in this case. He was a HAT-2 crew member and a close friend of Apollo's.

characters.name: Juniper Woods
characters.description1: Athena's childhood friend. I defended her when she was on trial for the courtroom bombing incident.

characters.name: Solomon Starbuck
characters.description1: The defendant in this case.[1] He was a HAT-2 crew member and a mentor to the victim.

characters.name: Simon Blackquill
characters.description1: Convicted of the murder at the Space Center seven years ago. He's chasing a phantom he saw back then.
characters.description2: A prosecutor who can get into people's heads. He was proven innocent after the false charges against him were exposed.

characters.name: Bobby Fulbright
characters.description1: The detective assigned to this case. He led the evacuation effort at the Space Center after the bombing incident.
characters.description2: He may very well be the spy behind the murders and bombings, both past and present.

characters.name: Candice Arme
characters.description1: A detective who specialized in bomb cases. Was on detail at the Space Center. One of the first to find the body.

characters.name: Yuri Cosmos
characters.description1: The director of the Space Center and one of the first people to discover the body. He seems exceedingly full of himself.

characters.name: Ponco
characters.description1: A guide robot at the Space Center. She can provide information on the Center and show people around.
characters.description2: A guide robot at the Space Center. She witnessed the murder seven years ago.

characters.name: Aura Blackquill
characters.description1: A researcher who's developing robots at the Space Center. She is Prosecutor Blackquill's older sister.

characters.name: Clonco
characters.description1: One of the robots developed by Aura, who refers to him as "Hunk of Junk".

characters.name: Metis Cykes
characters.description1: Athena's mother and victim of the murder seven years ago. She was a talented psychologist like her daughter.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: A spirit medium in training. Her psychic powers are beyond question.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: The chief prosecutor. He's an old friend and a former prosecutor against whom I fought many courtroom battles.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: A new lawyer at my agency. She studied psychology while she was in Europe.

characters.name: Apollo Justice
characters.description1: An ardent young lawyer in my agency. His special feature is his very loud voice.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: My daughter, who also happens to be an aspiring magician. I adopted her eight years ago.

characters.name: Sasha Buckler
characters.description1: An orca trainer and performer in the Swashbuckler Spectacular. She appears to be best friends with Orla.

characters.name: Bobby Fulbright
characters.description1: The detective assigned to this case. He sure makes a lot of noise, but he appears to be on the side of justice.

characters.name: Ora Shipley
characters.description1: The orca accused of murder. Though "Ora" is her real name, people like to call her "Orla". She likes to wear hats.
characters.description2: An orca nicknamed Orla. She has a wound on her head, and luminol revealed traces of blood on her body.

characters.name: Jack Shipley
characters.description1: The owner of Shipshape Aquarium. He was found dead in the orca pool.

characters.name: Norma DePlume
characters.description1: An aquarium visitor. She seems to know something about what happened.
characters.description2: The aquarium visitor who saw Orla attack the aquarium owner. It turns out she's a nonfiction writer.

characters.name: Marlon Rimes
characters.description1: Shipshape Aquarium's new animal keeper. He loves animals as much as he loves rapping.

characters.name: Rifle
characters.description1: A penguin that always shoots straight at her mark. She seems to love the smell of fish.
characters.description2: A penguin, not a deadly weapon! The bottoms of her flippers are stained pink, and a good luck charm was found in her stomach.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: A spirit medium in training. Her psychic powers are beyond question.

characters.name: Simon Blackquill
characters.description1: A prosecutor and prison inmate. He has mastered the use of psychological manipulation in courtroom battles.

characters.name: Herman Crab
characters.description1: Shipshape Aquarium's resident vet. A baby penguin lives in his hair.

characters.name: Azura Summers
characters.description1: The trainer who preceded Sasha. She died during a show on July 20th last year.
